category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 23 (Public Relations and Media Committee)
contents: Article 23 (Public Relations and Media Committee) The Public Relations and Media Committee responds to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Matters pertaining to the promotion of events and projects hosted by the Sports Council 2. Matters pertaining to the promotion of domestic and international sports competitions 3. Matters pertaining to the promotion of daily sports 4. Matters pertaining to the publication of regular and irregular publications 5. Matters pertaining to sports media organizations for the development of domestic sports 6. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Public Relations and Media Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This Article Newly Established April 2017] 3.]
